mapper.select: SELECT event_seq, event_name, event_description, event_type, event_url, queue_backpressure, created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by FROM events WHERE event_name = #{eventName}
SELECT event_seq, event_name, event_description, event_type, event_url, queue_backpressure, created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by FROM events
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO events ( event_name, event_description, event_type, event_url, queue_backpressure, created_by, updated_by ) VALUES ( #{eventName}, #{eventDescription}, #{eventType}, #{eventUrl}, #{queueBackpressure}, #{createdBy}, #{updatedBy} )
mapper.update: UPDATE events SET event_description = #{eventDescription}, event_type = #{eventType}, event_url = #{eventUrl}, queue_backpressure = #{queueBackpressure}, updated_by = #{updatedBy}, updated_at = now() WHERE event_name = #{eventName}
